question.title: @SqlResultSetMapping, getting org.springframework.orm.jpa.JpaSystemException: Could not resolve specified result-set mapping name
question.body:
After upgrading springboot application, we are seeing below exception, old versions: hibernate-core(5.4.25.Final), spring-boot-starter-data-jpa(2.4.2) New versions: hibernate-core(6.6.12.Final), spring-boot-starter-data-jpa(3.3.4)

Exception:

@SqlResultSetMapping(name = "SearchResultMapping",
      classes = {
            @ConstructorResult(
                  targetClass = SearchBomResponseEntity.class,
                  columns = {
                        @ColumnResult(name = "xx",              type = Long.class),
                        @ColumnResult(name = "xx",              type = String.class),
                        @ColumnResult(name = "xxxx",       type = Integer.class)
}

=====================================

org.springframework.orm.jpa.JpaSystemException: Could not resolve specified result-set mapping name: SearchResultMapping
    at org.springframework.orm.jpa.vendor.HibernateJpaDialect.convertHibernateAccessException(HibernateJpaDialect.java:341)
    at org.springframework.orm.jpa.vendor.HibernateJpaDialect.translateExceptionIfPossible(HibernateJpaDialect.java:241)
    at org.springframework.orm.jpa.AbstractEntityManagerFactoryBean.translateExceptionIfPossible(AbstractEntityManagerFactoryBean.java:550)
    at org.springframework.dao.support.ChainedPersistenceExceptionTranslator.translateExceptionIfPossible(ChainedPersistenceExceptionTranslator.java:61)
    at org.springframework.dao.support.DataAccessUtils.translateIfNecessary(DataAccessUtils.java:335)
